snippet: Google is moving into hardware, which is a goal of Larry Page, the chief executive, by developing an “entertainment device” to compete with Amazon and Apple.
abstract: Google is said to be developing a home entertainment device, a move into hardware that will bring the company more broadly into consumer electronics; Motorola Mobility is likely to build the device, as Google's $12.5 billion acquisition of the company is set to close; initial purpose of the device is for streaming music, but the eventual use could be much wider.

byline.original: By DAVID STREITFELD and NICOLE PERLROTH

lead_paragraph: Google is moving into hardware, which is a goal of Larry Page, the chief executive, by developing an “entertainment device” to compete with Amazon and Apple.

headline.seo: Google at Work on an ‘Entertainment Device’
headline.main: An ‘Entertainment Device’ Is Expected From Google
headline.print_headline: An ‘Entertainment Device’ Is Expected From Google
